Trend: BSI press releases cover digital transformation, cybersecurity, and smart technology; Bundesgesundheitsministerium emphasizes health data protection and COVID research.
Description: Latest press releases from BSI highlight topics such as digital transformation, secure supply chains, cloud solutions, cybersecurity, and smart technology. Other releases cover subjects including quantum security, smart energy, cybersecurity in healthcare, and IT service provider certifications. The Bundesgesundheitsministerium's announcements focus on initiatives related to health data protection, research networks for long-term COVID effects, and nationwide healthcare improvements.
